TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlDataSourceEnumerator extends System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator
Public NotInheritable Class SqlDataSourceEnumerator Inherits DbDataSourceEnumerator

summary.span: 提供了一种枚举本地网络内的所有可用 SQL Server 实例的机制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for enumerating all available instances of SQL Server within the local network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 使应用程序能够确定当前网络中是否存在其实例。SQL Server makes it possible for applications to determine the existence of its instances within the current network. 类向应用程序开发人员公开此信息, 并提供包含有关所有可用服务器的信息。 The class exposes this information to the application developer, providing a containing information about all the available servers. 此返回的表包含与用户尝试创建新连接时提供的列表匹配的服务器实例的列表, 并且在`Connection Properties`对话框中展开包含所有可用服务器的下拉列表。This returned table contains a list of server instances that matches the list provided when a user attempts to create a new connection, and on the `Connection Properties` dialog box, expands the drop-down list containing all the available servers.

related.span: 枚举 SQL Server 的实例
